name: Vendra
headline: AI copilot for hardware teams working with vendors
description: Vendra uses AI to automate project management and information lookup when working with vendors and suppliers - all with no change to existing workflows - letting hardware teams focus on building and shipping amazing products
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:hardware; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:collaboration; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Shan Mohta, Founder
founders.description: CEO of Vendra. I built cool hardware at Skydio, Apple, Microsoft.

founders.name: Anish Bhardwaj, Founder
founders.description: CTO of Vendra. I build software.

![Y Combinator](https://vendra.io/ycom.svg)Backed by Y Combinator
# Custom Parts,Made Simple.Made in America.
Vendra simplifies RFQs, communication, and purchasing for custom parts.We connect buyers and manufacturers across America like never before.
Request a QuoteLearn More
## How It Works
From design to part-in-hand, we make the process simple
### Submit Your Project
Share your project details and production needs through our simple form
### Get Connected
We connect you to our verified supplier network to manage quotes and design feedback
### Start Production
Select your supplier and begin production with full visibility through our management suite
### Delivery
We handle end-to-end logistics to get your parts shipped within schedule
## Experience the Difference
See how Vendra transforms manufacturing sourcing
## The Traditional Way
### Endless Research
Hours of Google searches, emails, and cold calls trying to find the right manufacturer
### No Automation
Manually repeat the search, outreach, and management for every single supplier
### No Standardization
Missed emails, incorrect files, and other miscommunication leads to costly mistakes and production delays
### Opaque and Expensive
Digital manufacturing platforms mark up prices and don't allow direct communication with the teams actually making your parts
## The Vendra Way
### AI-Powered Automation
  * Our AI sourcing agent instantly matches you to suppliers that meet your production needs
  * Get multiple competitive quotes with just one-click
  * Easily compare capabilities, pricing, and lead times


### Single Source of Truth
Access your files, quotes, and communication with suppliers in one centralized dashboard
### Supplier Onboarding Not Needed
Suppliers continue using emails, and Vendra acts as your communication relay
### Transparent and Fast
Go from design to production in days, not weeks - no learning curve required
Get Started Today
## Manufacturing Processes
Our verified suppliers offer a wide range of manufacturing capabilities
### CNC Machining
Precision high-tolerance machining for a wide range of materials, built to your specifications. We also offer secondary operations such as surface treatments and finishes.
### Injection Molding
Plastic injection molding processes across a wide range of sizes, part complexities, and volumes. Post-processing also available via surface finishes and texturing.
### 3D Printing
Advanced additive manufacturing for rapid prototyping and production parts. Multiple materials available including plastics, resins, and metals with various finish options.
### Sheet Metal Fabrication
Comprehensive sheet metal services including cutting, bending, and welding. From prototype to production with various material options and surface finishing.
## Request a Quote
Tell us about your project and we'll connect you with the right manufacturers

All uploads are secure and confidential
I acknowledge that these parts are not subject to ITAR or other U.S. export restrictions
Request a Quote
## Our Mission
At Vendra, our mission is to empower buyers and manufacturers across America by making it easier to source and produce custom parts. We use AI to bridge the gap between modern buyer expectations and traditional manufacturing workflows, creating new opportunities for collaboration.
Vendra is built in the United States by experts in hardware and software.üá∫üá∏

Empowering American manufacturingthrough innovative supply chain solutions.

generated_description:
### Vendra: Your AI Copilot for Hardware Teams

Vendra, founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, is reshaping how hardware teams collaborate with vendors and suppliers. Based in San Francisco, this nimble company, with just a two-person team, is on a mission to automate project management and streamline information retrieval‚Äîwithout causing any disruption to existing workflows. This means that hardware teams can zero in on what they do best: building and shipping exceptional products.

#### The Problem with Traditional Sourcing

When it comes to sourcing custom parts, teams often get bogged down in **endless research**‚Äîthink hours spent slogging through Google searches, sending countless emails, and making cold calls. The traditional methods are rife with **manual processes** that lead to repeated searches for suppliers, miscommunication, and ultimately costly delays. Plus, many digital manufacturing platforms inflate prices and keep buyers at arm's length from the teams actually producing their parts.

#### The Vendra Solution

Enter Vendra, the smart solution to these age-old problems. The platform not only simplifies the process of RFQs (requests for quotes) and communication but also introduces **AI-powered automation** that instantly matches users with verified suppliers based on their production needs. Here‚Äôs how it works:

1. **Submit Your Project**: Provide project details through a straightforward form.
2. **Get Connected**: Vendra connects you to a verified supplier network, managing both quotes and design feedback.
3. **Start Production**: After selecting a supplier, you can kick off production while enjoying full visibility through their management suite.
4. **Delivery**: Vendra takes care of logistics, ensuring parts arrive on schedule.

With Vendra, you skip the learning curve and eliminate delays, going from design to production in days‚Äînot weeks.

#### Comprehensive Manufacturing Capabilities

Vendra supports a variety of manufacturing processes, including:

- **CNC Machining**: Precision machining tailored to your specifications.
- **Injection Molding**: Plastic processes that cater to diverse complexities and volumes.
- **3D Printing**: Advanced prototyping and production, utilizing multiple materials.
- **Sheet Metal Fabrication**: From bending to welding, they cover comprehensive sheet metal needs.

#### A Mission for Collaboration

Ultimately, Vendra wants to empower American manufacturing by enhancing the connection between buyers and manufacturers. Their solution bridges modern buyer expectations with traditional workflows, fostering collaboration and driving new opportunities.

For teams eager to streamline their manufacturing sourcing, Vendra presents a compelling option. By leveraging AI in the supply chain, they are not just innovating the process; they are fundamentally changing the game for hardware teams everywhere.

Check out more about this exciting startup at their website: [vendra.io](https://vendra.io).
